title: Charged | Ep 1: Born In Brooklyn
description:
The mayor of New York deals with a big political problem by creating a new court in Brooklyn. Two men, born 25 years and a few blocks apart in Brooklyn, take entirely different paths to meet at that court—one as a defendant and the other as the district attorney. 
This episode is sponsored by Audible. Start listening with a 30-day Audible trial and your first audiobook plus two Audible Originals are free. Visit audible.com/CHARGED or text CHARGED to 500-500

itunes:subtitle: A brutal new court opens in Brooklyn. Two men's lives intersect inside of it.
